mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_PERMISSION( appId, modularId, parentId, icon, name, url, sort, isMenu, isEnable ) VALUES ( #{appId}, #{modularId}, #{parentId}, #{icon}, #{name}, #{url}, #{sort}, #{isMenu}, #{isEnable} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_PERMISSION a SET a.`appId` = #{appId}, a.`modularId` = #{modularId}, a.`parentId` = #{parentId}, a.`icon` = #{icon}, a.`name` = #{name}, a.`url` = #{url}, a.`sort` = #{sort}, a.`isMenu` = #{isMenu}, a.isEnable = #{isEnable} WHERE a.`id` = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT p.id AS id, p.parentId AS parentId, m.code AS modular, p.name AS name, p.url AS url, p.icon AS icon, p.isMenu AS isMenu FROM SYS_PERMISSION p LEFT JOIN SYS_MODULAR m ON p.modularId=m.id and p.appId=m.appId
INNER JOIN SYS_RE_ROLE_PERMISSION rp ON p.id = rp.permissionId INNER JOIN SYS_ROLE r ON r.id = rp.roleId AND r.isEnable = 1 INNER JOIN SYS_RE_USER_ROLE ur ON ur.roleId = r.id
WHERE 1 = 1 AND p.isEnable = 1
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SYS_APP a WHERE a.id = p.appId AND a.isEnable = 1 AND a.code = #{appCode})
AND ur.userId = #{userId}
ORDER BY p.parentId ASC, p.sort DESC
SELECT * FROM SYS_PERMISSION a WHERE a.modularId = #{modularId} ORDER BY a.sort DESC
